sentence: Verbal communication is essential to human life.

mean_cn: n. 内容, 目录;  满足;  adj.  满足的;v.  使满意

mean_cn: adj. 有说服力的; 使人信服的;

mean_cn: adj. 有趣的；好玩的；引人发笑的

mean_cn: prep. 遍及;  adv. 到处;

sentence: We're all very content with our family life.

sentence: The universe is vast.

mean_cn: n. 弱势的一方；受害者，输家

sentence_tra: 如果不能增加销售额，我就是一个失败者！

sentence: At work, she amuses herself by playing around.

mean_cn: n. 享受, 享有;  乐趣;  愉快;

mean_cn: adv.遗憾的是，可惜的是，不幸的是

sentence: Our profits need to be much higher than they have been up to now.

sentence: They are so badly off, they can't afford food or shelter.

mean_cn: n. 节奏;  韵律; 格律;

mean_cn: vi. 指导;  引路, 当向导;  导演;  领唱;  adj. 笔直的;  直接的;  率直的;  vt. 指导, 引导;  管理;  导演;  adv. 直接地, 径直地;
sentence: The direct flight is more time-saving than transit flight.

mean_cn: adj.迷人的；妩媚的；娇艳的；好极了的

sentence: I love these old shoes but they're too worn now: I need to buy a new pair.

sentence: The performers in the play were wonderful, simply wonderful!
sentence_tra: 戏中的表演者们太棒了，就是棒！

mean_cn: adj. 多山的;  巨大的;

sentence: I was astonished by all the gifts I received for my birthday.

mean_cn: n. 信任;  自信, 信心;  adj. 骗得信任的;

sentence: I can't wear these worn-out shoes any longer!

sentence: In the west, they like to eat pancakes for breakfast.
sentence_tra: 在西方，人们早餐喜欢吃薄烤饼。

sentence: The cake was cut and beer was served on the occasion.

mean_cn: vt. 生产, 出产, 制造;  输出;  vi. 生产, 出产, 制造;  输出;  n. 产量;  作品;  输出;

sentence_tra: 我每周都擦橱柜，以免灰尘影响。

sentence: The farmer used fertilizer to improve his crop production.
sentence_tra: 农民用肥料来提高作物产量。

sentence: Everyone was taken aback by the boy's discovery of a new flower.
sentence_tra: 每个人都对这个小男孩发现一种新的小花感到吃惊。

mean_cn: n. 负担，紧张v. 拉紧

sentence: Peanuts are a healthy and delicious snack.

sentence: Please deliver the package to the front door.
sentence_tra: 请从前门送快递。

mean_cn: n. 巢;  温床;  vi. 筑巢;  vt. 为…筑巢;
sentence: Most birds lay their eggs in their nests.
sentence_tra: 大多数鸟儿把蛋生在它们的巢穴里。

sentence: Hi, cat, what do you intend to do - eat me, or just watch me?
sentence_tra: 嗨，小猫，你想干吗？吃掉我还是只是看着我。

mean_cn: n.计划，方案，工程v.伸出，投影，规划
sentence: The construction project is moving quickly.
sentence_tra: 这个建筑工程进展迅速。

sentence: He was too outspoken, so she taped his mouth shut.
sentence_tra: 他说话太直了，所以她封住了他的嘴。

mean_cn: v.继续开展，坚持，举止失常
sentence: Don't stop what you were doing; carry on.
sentence_tra: 不要停止你现在做的事情，继续。

sentence: I always see opportunity when I come across another businessman like me.
sentence_tra: 每次遇到像我这样的生意人时，我都会看到商机。

mean_cn: n. (演讲、音乐会等的)听众, 观众;  正式会见;  拥护者;
sentence: We invite students from drama schools to be our audiences.
sentence_tra: 我们请了戏剧学校的学生来我们节目当观众。

mean_cn: adj. 考虑周到的；体贴的
sentence: My mother is always considerate of other people's feelings.
sentence_tra: 我妈妈总是很照顾别人的感受。

mean_cn: v. 参看，涉及，归因于，托付
sentence: When cooking a new recipe I always refer to the cookbook.
sentence_tra: 在烹饪新菜时我总要查阅烹饪书。

sentence: The workers argue about whose fault the mistake was.
sentence_tra: 员工们在争论错误是谁犯的。

mean_cn: v. 使生灵感；启示；激发
sentence: Seeing the sunrise on the mountain top really inspired me.
sentence_tra: 看着太阳从山顶升起对我是很大的激励。

mean_cn: 参考；涉及；指的是；适用于；谈到
sentence: I can't cook, so I refer to books to teach me how.
sentence_tra: 我不会做饭,所以我通过查书来学习。

sentence: Many people came to support the president's campaign.
sentence_tra: 很多人都来这儿支持总统的竞选活动。

sentence: We go to the movies for some entertainment.
sentence_tra: 我们的娱乐方式是看电影。

sentence: He specializes in fixing computers.
sentence_tra: 他专门从事修电脑这一行。

sentence: Chimps love to swing around high above the jungle.
sentence_tra: 黑猩猩爱在树林高处荡来荡去。

mean_cn: n.考虑，思考；体贴，体谅，顾及
sentence: He gave my proposal due consideration.
sentence_tra: 他适当地考虑了我的提议。

mean_cn: (想法、问题等)涌上心头； 涌入脑海；挤入
sentence: The audience crowded in around the singers.
sentence_tra: 听众们挤在了歌手们的周围。

mean_cn: n. 观察;  注意;  评论;  遵守;
sentence: Telescope observation revealed many secrets about the new star.
sentence_tra: 望远镜观测揭开了关于这颗新恒星的许多秘密。

sentence: Don't touch this landmine - the explosion will kill you!
sentence_tra: 不要碰这个地雷――你会被炸死的！

sentence: My father gives me a lot of love and support.
sentence_tra: 我的父亲给予我很多爱与支持。

sentence: They look down on me because I haven't worked here as long as they have.
sentence_tra: 他们瞧不起我，因为我在这工作时间没他们长。

sentence: Graduating from university in such a short time is a major achievement.
sentence_tra: 在这么短时间内从大学毕业是很大的成就。

mean_cn: n.仁慈，亲切；好意；友好行为
sentence: She showed kindness to her cat.
sentence_tra: 她对她的猫很好。

mean_cn: n.荫；遮光物；阴凉处；阴影v.荫蔽
sentence: It's so pleasant to rest here in the shade of the tree!
sentence_tra: 在树荫下休息太舒服了。

mean_cn: n.灵感；鼓舞人心的人(或事物)；妙计，好办法
sentence: I come to the mountains to find inspiration and enlightenment.
sentence_tra: 我来山里寻找灵感和启迪。

mean_cn: n. 束缚物, 联结物;  凝聚力;  债券;  保释金;  vi. 结合;  团结一致;
sentence: Family members have a strong bond. You can never tear them apart.
sentence_tra: 家庭成员之间有着坚实的凝聚力，你永远也不能拆散他们。

mean_cn: n. 一代;  一代人;  生育;  产生;  拷贝;
sentence: My family includes three generations of people: my parents, myself, and my kids.
sentence_tra: 我们家三代同堂：我的父母、我还有我的孩子们。

sentence: His behavior in class has improved a lot over the past month.
sentence_tra: 在过去的一个月里他在班里的举止改善很多。

mean_cn: n. 紧急情况，突发事件
sentence: It's an emergency: get her to the hospital as soon as possible.
sentence_tra: 情况紧急，尽快送她去医院。

mean_cn: adj.值得(花时间、精力)的，合算的
sentence: I hate the job, but the money makes it worthwhile.
sentence_tra: 我恨这个工作，但是钱让它值得花时间和精力去做。

sentence: The Quakers are a religious movement whose first tenet is non-violence.
sentence_tra: 夸克党是个宗教运动，一开始它的教义是非暴力的。

sentence: In our organization, everyone takes orders from me - is that clear?
sentence_tra: 在我们的组织中，每个人都听令于我――明白了吗？

mean_cn: v.举动，运转；举止端正(或良好、适当)
sentence: "Now, you behave at school!" shouted the angry father.
sentence_tra: “现在，你给我在学校好好表现！”愤怒的父亲咆哮道。

mean_cn: n. 专家; 专科医生;  adj. 专家的; 专业的;
sentence: Be relaxed! We are specialists for plastic surgery!
sentence_tra: 放心吧！我们可是整容专家！

mean_cn: v. 尊敬，敬重n. 敬重，尊敬；方面

sentence_tra: 日本人通过鞠躬来表达尊重。

sentence: She has built her career as a businesswoman.
sentence_tra: 她以一个女商人的身份开始了职业生涯。

sentence: We saw various types of fish during our dive.
sentence_tra: 在潜水时我们看到了各种各样的鱼。

mean_cn: n.竞技；厮打v.进行马上长矛比武；竞争
sentence: The two men are jousting.
sentence_tra: 这两个人在进行马上长矛比武。

sentence: The elephants take us deeper into the jungle.
sentence_tra: 大象们带我们深入丛林。

sentence: The basketball tournament will end with a single winner.
sentence_tra: 这次篮球联赛会只有一个获胜队伍。

sentence: The settlers traveled very far.
sentence_tra: 这些移民者经历了长途跋涉。

sentence: The old craftsman is concentrating on his art work.
sentence_tra: 这个年迈的工匠正专注于自己的艺术作品。

mean_cn: v. 提升，提前n. 前进，增长，接近
sentence: I'd like to advance as high up in this company as possible.
sentence_tra: 我想在这座公司里尽可能地爬高。

mean_cn: n. 幻想;  幻想作品;  vi. 奏幻想曲;  vt. 想像, 幻想;
sentence: My greatest fantasy is to be showered in money.
sentence_tra: 我最大的幻想就是沐浴在钞票里。

sentence: Wait, why am I combing my hair?--I'm bald, I don't have any hair.
sentence_tra: 等等，我为什么要梳头？我是秃头，我根本没有头发。

sentence: I bought this flag as a souvenir on my trip.
sentence_tra: 我在旅途中买了这面旗子作为纪念品。

mean_cn: n. 准许进入;  进入权;  入场费;  录用;  承认;  确认的事实;
sentence: Sorry, no admission - you can't come in!
sentence_tra: 抱歉，未经允许，不得入内！

sentence: On summer weekends we try to arrange a family outing to the beach.
sentence_tra: 夏季周末，我们打算计划一次全家出游去海边。

sentence: The beach is a popular location for tourism.
sentence_tra: 海边是旅游胜地。

mean_cn: n. 海盗;  剽窃者;  vt. 以海盗方式掠夺;  剽窃;
sentence: We're going to dress up as pirates for the costume party.
sentence_tra: 我们在化装舞会中要打扮成海盗的样子。

mean_cn: n. 少数; 少数民族; 未成年;  adj. 构成少数的;

sentence_tra: 少数民族穿着颜色各异的服饰。

sentence: Going on amusement park rides terrifies me.
sentence_tra: 还要再玩这种游乐设施，我受不了啊！

sentence: The athletic man runs for long distances without needing to rest.
sentence_tra: 运动员可以跑很长距离并且不用休息。

sentence: This mosquito will be preserved for thousands of years!
sentence_tra: 这只蚊子能够保存上千年！

sentence: Let's go to the amusement park and take a ride on the roller coaster!
sentence_tra: 我们去游乐园玩过山车吧！

sentence: Is your favorite creature the dog, cat, or rabbit?
sentence_tra: 你最喜欢的动物是狗，猫还是兔子？

sentence: This electronic translator is easy to use.
sentence_tra: 这个电子辞典非常好用。

sentence: The shuttle will take us to the airport.
sentence_tra: 机场大巴会接我们去机场。

mean_cn: n.吸引，吸引力，具有吸引力的事物(或人)
sentence: As soon as we met, there was an instant attraction between us.
sentence_tra: 我们一见面，我们之间瞬间就有一种吸引力。

sentence: The carpenter works on the house.
sentence_tra: 木匠从事房屋（建造）工作。

sentence: If you want to be a deep sea diver, you'll have to practice.
sentence_tra: 如果你想成为一名深海潜水员，你需要练习。

sentence: The knight protected our village from intruders.
sentence_tra: 骑士保护我们的村庄免于入侵。

sentence: This cloth has a beautiful design.
sentence_tra: 这匹布设计得很漂亮。

mean_cn: n. 主题;  主旨;  作文;  adj. 主题的;

sentence_tra: 这个生日派对的主题是扮小丑。

sentence: The sunlight brightens the green field.
sentence_tra: 阳光照亮了绿地。

sentence: Me and my best friend like to get close to each other.
sentence_tra: 我和我最好的朋友喜欢互相亲近。

sentence: My young son's behaviour is all modelled after Einstein's.
sentence_tra: 我小儿的行为几乎都是模仿的爱因斯坦。

mean_cn: n. 摇摆;  摆幅;  转弯;  打击;  旋律;  vi. 摇荡;  来回摆动;  转动;  转向;  vt. 使摇摆;  使转动;  使, 转向;
sentence: He swings in the forest from tree to tree.
sentence_tra: 他在丛林树间荡来荡去。

sentence: Zombies are dead people come to life.
sentence_tra: 丧尸是复活的死人。

sentence: Only in fairy tales do frogs turn into princes!
sentence_tra: 只有在童话故事中青蛙才能变成王子。

sentence: I'm happy when I get on the freeway because I don't have to wait for traffic lights.
sentence_tra: 上高速时我开心极了，因为我再也不用等红灯了。

mean_cn: n. 鬼鬼祟祟的人; 运动鞋;
sentence: My yellow sneakers are comfortable, fit my feet, and look good!
sentence_tra: 我的黄色运动鞋很舒服，合脚又好看！真棒！

sentence: In his superhero identity he could do brave and difficult deeds.
sentence_tra: 以他超人的身份他能做到勇敢并且困难的事。

sentence: I use a tape to measure the length of the wood.
sentence_tra: 我用卷尺测量木头长度。

sentence: It's hard to tell what the weekend's weather will be in advance.

mean_cn: pron. 无论哪个； 无论哪些

sentence_tra: 无论哪种饮料，只要是最好喝的就行。

sentence: Wherever you want your package to go, we can deliver it.
sentence_tra: 无论你想让你的行李去哪儿，我们都能传送。

sentence: This science seems to be too advanced for him!
sentence_tra: 看起来科学对他来说太难（高级）了。

sentence: Einstein was famous for funny hair as well as physics.
sentence_tra: 爱因斯坦有趣的头发跟他的物理学一样出名。

sentence: We should all meet at a central point.
sentence_tra: 我们都应该去中心点那碰头。

mean_cn: adj.独特的，独一无二的adj.(唯一的) 特有的
sentence: Fingerprints are unique to each individual.
sentence_tra: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

sentence: These companies all have very well-known brands.
sentence_tra: 这些公司都有非常知名的品牌。

sentence: This is a cartoon of Noah's Ark.
sentence_tra: 这是诺亚方舟的漫画。

sentence: There was a problem with the engine of my car.
sentence_tra: 我车里的引擎出了点问题。

sentence: At the museum they had a sword on display that was over 800 years old.
sentence_tra: 在博物馆陈列着一把有八百多年历史的剑。

mean_cn: n. 声明，陈述；结算单，报表

sentence_tra: 他向记者发表了一份声明。

sentence: Our anti-virus software will defend your computer against attacks.
sentence_tra: 我们的杀毒软件能帮助你的电脑抵御攻击。

sentence: She cannot control her anger.
sentence_tra: 她不能控制自己的怒火。

sentence: I don't like the way our teacher ranks all the students from best to worst.
sentence_tra: 我不喜欢老师这种把所有学生从最好到最差分等级的做法。

mean_cn: n. 面颊, 脸蛋;  vt. 无礼地说;

sentence_tra: 她把面霜涂在脸颊上来保养皮肤。

sentence: I like to eat simply: just plain vegetables for me.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢吃简单些，只要给我些普通的的蔬菜就行。

sentence: I have to get to the airport quickly--my flight leaves in an hour!
sentence_tra: 我必须赶快到达机场――我的飞机在一个小时后要飞了！

sentence: This is a good set of cards that is likely to win the game.
sentence_tra: 这是一副好牌，可能能赢得游戏。

sentence: That's a very curiously placed conference table!
sentence_tra: 那些会议桌摆放得不可思议。

mean_cn: adj.有可能；可信的；适合的adv.很可能

sentence_tra: 如果你看到乌云，可能会下雨。

sentence: English and Chinese are some of the world's most commonly spoken languages.
sentence_tra: 英语和汉语是世界上最常用的口语。

mean_cn: n. 成年人;  adj. 成年的;  成年人的;  色情的;

sentence_tra: 我们都是成年人了，亲亲我！

sentence: Her false identity fooled all of us at first.
sentence_tra: 一开始她的假身份欺骗了我们所有人。

sentence: I think he misunderstands the recipe.
sentence_tra: 我认为他误解了食谱（上的做法）。

sentence: I love going to Italy for the food and sightseeing.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢去意大利因为那有美味的食物和美丽的风景。

sentence: Spain is famous for bull fights and flamenco dancing.
sentence_tra: 西班牙以斗牛和弗拉门科舞而闻名。

sentence: We're lost - we must have misread the map.
sentence_tra: 我们迷路了――我们肯定错读了地图。

mean_cn: v.描述，表示；代表，代理；阐明，说明
sentence: These pictures represent different kinds of weather.
sentence_tra: 这些图片代表了不同类型的天气。

mean_cn: n. 呵欠;  裂开;  vi. 打呵欠;  裂开;  vt. 打着呵欠说;
sentence: "I'm so tired," she said as she yawned.
sentence_tra: “我好累啊，”她打着哈欠说。

mean_cn: n. 结合;  伙伴, 关系;  协会, 联盟;  联想;

sentence_tra: 我们的协会里有很多拥有不同技能的成员。

sentence: "I'm not a snake; this is a misunderstanding!"
sentence_tra: 我不是蛇，这是个误会！

sentence: All the racers dash forward.
sentence_tra: 所有选手向前猛冲。

sentence: This gentleman takes his hat off to greet people.
sentence_tra: 这位绅士脱下他的帽子，向人们问好。

sentence: My mom always told me to keep a straight posture.
sentence_tra: 我妈妈总提醒我保持挺直的姿势。

mean_cn: n. 皱眉;  不悦;  vi. 皱眉;  不赞成;  vt. 使哑口无言;

sentence: The woman learns self defence.
sentence_tra: 这个女人学习自卫。

sentence: Jordan lies to the East of Israel, in the Middle East.
sentence_tra: 约旦位于中东，在以色列的东部。

sentence: Columbia is unfortunately mostly famous for its drug trade.
sentence_tra: 很不幸的是哥伦比亚主要以毒品交易而出名。

sentence: Let's go get some food at the canteen.
sentence_tra: 我们一起去食堂吃点东西吧。

mean_cn: n.穆斯林，穆罕默德信徒 adj.穆斯林的
sentence: Muslim women are required to cover their body and hair with a special dress.
sentence_tra: 穆斯林妇女需要用特殊的衣服遮住身体和头发。

mean_cn: adj.无言的；未说出口的；不言而喻的

sentence_tra: 嘘，永远别说出我们的秘密！

mean_cn: n. 上级; 少校; 专业;  vi. 专攻;  adj. 较大的; 重要的; 主要的;

sentence: Lying in the grass gives her a feeling of ease and comfort.
sentence_tra: 躺在草地上让她轻松舒适。

sentence: She greeted us in a respectful manner.
sentence_tra: 她有礼貌地问候了我们。

mean_cn: n.功能，作用，[pl.]职务，职责；函数v.起作用；正常运转

sentence_tra: 消化系统的功能是为我们提供营养并维持生命。

sentence: In general swans are white, but there are some black swans.
sentence_tra: 天鹅通常是白色的，但也有黑色的天鹅存在。

mean_cn: n. 面部按摩, 美容;  adj. 表面的, 面部的;

sentence_tra: 美容能帮助她保持皮肤看起来光滑细嫩的状态。

mean_cn: n. 拳头;  笔迹;  vt. 用拳头打;  握成拳;  紧握;

sentence_tra: 男孩握紧拳头，一脸雄心勃勃的样子。

sentence: The elephants are approaching us.

sentence: He must truly love you if he gave you flowers.
sentence_tra: 如果他送你花就证明他一定真的爱上你了。

sentence: You look very much at ease, lying on that sofa!
sentence_tra: 你躺在沙发上看起来很放松。

sentence: Liking wine is subjective - some people do, some people don't.
sentence_tra: 喝酒是个人喜好，有的人喜欢，有的人不喜欢。

sentence: Her embarrassing slip-up caused her to lose face in front of her friends.
sentence_tra: 她那令人尴尬的错误让她在她的朋友面前丢了面子。

mean_cn: n. 集体宿舍;  宿舍;

sentence_tra: 我们学校刚刚修了一个能容下400张床的宿舍给新生住。

sentence: As the boss, I care about all my employees.
sentence_tra: 作为老板，我非常在意我的员工们。

mean_cn: adj. 好奇的;  好管闲事的;  古怪的;

sentence: The happy couple hugs in front of their new house.
sentence_tra: 这对开心的夫妇相拥在他们的新房子前。
